description.short: When you make the best-selling mid-size truck you must make a bigger one. Texas-sized to be exact.
description.long:
When you make the best-selling mid-size truck you must make a bigger one. Texas-sized to be exact.

The Toyota Tundra is manufactured here in Texas and is built to be a serious workhorse or a weekend off roading machine. Let THOR give your Tundra the performance and features you just can't get from the factory.
